choices.A: one file for vManage and one file for all other devices with extension .bin
choices.D: one file for vManage, one for vSmart, and one for vBond + WAN Edge Cloud with extension tar.gz
choices.C: one file for vManage and one file for all other devices with extension tar.gz
choices.B: one file for vManage, one for vSmart, and one for vBond + WAN Edge Cloud with extension .bin

questions.question_text: A customer must upgrade the Cisco SD-WAN devices and controllers from version 19.2 to version 20.3. The devices include WAN Edge Cloud, vManage, vSmart, and vBond. Which types of image files are needed for this upgrade?

discussion.content: C is correct - verify this via https://software.cisco.com/download/home/286320995/type/286321394/release/20.3.4

Selected Answer: C
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/wan/dpt/220424-upgrade-sd-wan-controllers-with-the-use.html

Selected Answer: C
C is correct. the question says UPDATE. in software.cisco.com.co > SDWAN> SD-WAN Software Update is the answer. https://software.cisco.com/download/home/286320995/type/286321394/release/20.3.2

D. one file for vManage, one for vSmart, and one for vBond + WAN Edge Cloud with extension tar.gz

This is because, typically, the SD-WAN controllers and devices each require their own specific software images, and the .tar.gz format is commonly used for Cisco SD-WAN software upgrades.

Selected Answer: C
Correta C

Selected Answer: D
D is right, because you dont' use same image on both vSmart and vBond/WEN edges

Selected Answer: C
C is correct
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
C is correct, documentation on the comments.

Selected Answer: C
C for sure

Selected Answer: C
C - I did it some months ago in our production sdwan devices
correct answer is C. Letter D is when you deploy the sdwan for the first time

Selected Answer: C
C is Correct according to Cisco documentation https://software.cisco.com/download/home/286320995/type/286321394/release/20.3.4
C is Correct

In the SD-WAN 2.0 (ENSDWI20) course Lab 13: Perform Cisco SD-WAN Software Upgrade there was 1 image for vManage and 1 image for vSmarts, vBonds and vEdges. Therefore I would say C is the correct answer.
B is correct - see https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/routers/sdwan/command/sdwan-cr-book/operational-cmd.html#wp1526475327

As per below syntax, option B is the correct answer
request vedge-cloud activate chassis-number number token token

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/routers/sdwan/command/sdwan-cr-book/operational-cmd.html#r_request_vedge_3137.xml

For physical device:
request vedge [add | delete] serial-num <number> chassis-num <number>

For cloud router:
request vedge-cloud activate chassis-number <number> token <token>

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.
